settings.title: CONTACT US
settings.content:
お問い合わせ

営業時間：12:00～18:00
（休業日：月・火曜日、年末年始など）
settings.content_en:
Inquiry

Open 12:00-18:00
（Holidays : Monday, and Tueaday, year-end and New Year holidays）
settings.content_ch:
联系我们

开放时间：12:00-18:00
(休息时间：周一、周二、年终和新年假期等)

settings.title: CLUB FUMIKODA
settings.content: お得な情報をメールでお届けいたします
settings.content_en: You can receive articles from the FUMIKODA JOURNAL, special event announcements, and other information via e-mail, and you can also apply for the "Present Campaign" to win popular FUMIKODA products.
settings.content_ch: 您可以通过电子邮件收到《富美家杂志》的文章、特别活动通知和其他信息，您还可以申请参加 "礼物活动"，赢取受欢迎的富美家产品。

settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.title: About the shop
settings.content: Use this text area to tell your customers about your brand and vision. You can change it in the theme settings.

settings.title: Newsletter
settings.content: Subscribe to receive updates, access to exclusive deals, and more.
